'''Anemo Slime-Swallowed Bamboo Shoots''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part I]]" Event [[World Quest]]. It is automatically added to the player's inventory after shooting the floating [[Anemo Slime]] tracked by [[Cloud Retainer]]'s machine. Cloud Retainer says that [[Ganyu]] prepared this ingredient.
